tasks.prompt: Research Handlebars.js features for CLI command templating.
tasks.decision: Use Handlebars.js as the template engine.
tasks.rationale: Simple syntax, natively supported helpers, and easy integration with Node.js.

tasks.prompt: Design template storage and fallback mechanism.
tasks.decision: Store templates in `templates/adapters/[platform]/[command].hbs` and fallback to `generic` platform.
tasks.rationale: Clear isolation between platforms and ensures robustness with a fallback.
alternatives: Single monolithic template with complex IFs

tasks.prompt: Analyze spec-kit source code for implementation patterns.
tasks.decision: Adopt Placeholder patterns via Runtime Helpers.
tasks.rationale: spec-kit uses build-time shell scripts to replace {SCRIPT} and {ARGS}. We will achieve the same outcome dynamically using Handlebars helpers {{agent_script}} and {{agent_args}}.
alternatives: Copy spec-kit's shell script build system (too rigid)
